external_references.description: Chandel, R. (2021, April 22). Defense Evasion: Windows Event Logging (T1562.002). Retrieved September 14, 2021.
Heiligenstein, L. (n.d.). REP-25: Disable Windows Event Logging. Retrieved April 7, 2022.

description: Monitor the addition of the MiniNT registry key in HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control, which may disable Event Viewer.(Citation: def_ev_win_event_logging)(Citation: disable_win_evt_logging)
